sentences.english: The street is over arched by ginkgoes.
sentences.chinese: 那條街道給拱形的銀杏樹遮蓋着。

sentences.english: This more-than-3,000-year-old gingko still has luxuriant foliage.
sentences.chinese: 三千多年的銀杏樹依然枝繁葉茂。

sentences.english: The granny was strange to Qiuqiu, who was picking up ginkgoes under the ginkgo tree.
sentences.chinese: 那時，秋秋正在村頭的銀杏樹下撿銀杏。

sentences.english: Effects of root-excision on trunk hydraulic traits and growth status of Ginkgo biloba.
sentences.chinese: 斷根處理對銀杏樹體水力特徵及生長的影響。

sentences.english: Look up at tall ginkgo trees, October, ginkgo nut has been matured quietly.
sentences.chinese: 仰望高大的銀杏樹，十月，銀杏果已經悄悄成熟了。

sentences.english: We don't have them here, I'm afraid. Ginkgo trees grow well only in cold weather.
sentences.chinese: 我們這裏恐怕沒有，銀杏樹只有在寒帶才長得好。

sentences.english: Many residential streets are lined with gingko trees.
sentences.chinese: 住宅區街道兩旁種上了銀杏樹。

sentences.english: The ginkgo is a tree of treasures.
The invention is suitable for various kernel apricots, and other fruit trees can also take the invention for reference.
sentences.chinese: 適用於各種仁用杏樹，其它果樹也可參考使用。

sentences.english: You see, this gingko tree is embraced by many smaller gingko trees.
sentences.chinese: 你看，這株銀杏樹的周圍簇擁着許多小銀杏樹。

sentences.english: You see, this gingko tree is embraced by many smaller gingko trees.
sentences.chinese: 你看，這株銀杏樹的周圍簇擁着許多小銀杏樹。

sentences.english: Autumn in Tokyo, marked by blazing colors on gingko trees.
sentences.chinese: 東京的秋天，以銀杏樹熾烈的色彩爲標誌。

sentences.english: Han Jia, you are personifying these gingko trees.
sentences.chinese: 韓佳，你又把銀杏樹給擬人化了。

sentences.english: Gingkos are the backbone of a greenery campaign initiated by Mr. Bo, the party secretary.
sentences.chinese: 移植銀杏樹是市委書記薄熙來推行綠色運動的重點。

sentences.english: Hong U main entrence, maidenhair trees along side the road, yellow leaves on the ground.
sentences.chinese: 弘大正門，街道兩旁的銀杏樹，黃葉滿地。

sentences.english: Planted with almond trees around the village a tree covered with sweet fruit.
sentences.chinese: 在村子四周種了杏樹，樹上結滿了香甜的果實。

definition: Lishu county in Siping 四平, Jilin/Lishu district of Jixi city 雞西|鸡西[Ji1 xi1], Heilongjiang
mulberry tree, with leaves used to feed silkworms
fig. beautiful purples and brilliant reds (idiom); lit. beautiful flowers
